summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3427, for the improvement of West 61st Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to a point four hundred twenty-three (423) feet west thereof all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42544 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
